Sentencas: The aim of this study is to increase the power generation/exergy efficiency and reduce total product cost/environmental contamination of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: Accordingly, three integrated systems are proposed and analyzed from energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, and environmental viewpoints through the parametric study.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: The first model assesses the combination of a gasifier with a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: In the second model, waste heat of the first model is reused in the Stirling engine to enhance the efficiency and power generation.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: The last model proposes reuse of the surplus power of the Stirling engine in a proton exchange membrane electrolyzer for hydrogen production.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: Considering total product cost, exergy efficiency, and hydrogen production rate as the objective functions, a multi-objective optimization is applied based on the genetic algorithm.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: The results indicate that at the optimum operating condition, the exergy efficiency of the model (a), (b), and (c) is 28.51%, 39.51%, and 38.03%, respectively.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: Corresponding values for the energy efficiency and the emission rate of the models are 31.13%, 67.38%, 66.41%, 1.147 t/MWh, 0.7113 t/MWh, 0.7694 t/MWh.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: At the optimum solution point, total product cost associated with the model (a), (b), and (c) is 19.33 $/GJ, 18.91 $/GJ, and 24.93 $/GJ, respectively.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: If the hydrogen production rate and total product cost considered as the objective functions, at optimum solution point, the rate of hydrogen production and overall product cost would be 56.5 kg/day and 41.76 $/GJ, respectively.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer

Sentencas: Overall, the proposed integrated systems demonstrate decent functionality both in thermodynamic, environmental, and economic aspects.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell integrated with Stirling engine and electrolyzer
